hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold respectively...^ #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple MQ GS Sun Block Room

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #4# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Hover Boots#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Mirror Puzzle Invisible Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Fire Temple Compass# and #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Eye Statue Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: You've met with a terrible fate, haven't you?

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Compass Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path First Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Third Right Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #Morpha#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Requiem of Spirit#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Purple Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Right

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Fishing Pond#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #3# major items.

ToT (Left).text: Three things are certain: death, taxes, and forgetting a check.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #Dampé's Hut#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #spider behind webs# in a grotto holds #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Lon Lon Tower#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombchus (10 pieces)# and #the Mirror Shield#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
